# Most Wanted

These pages hold 'reported' types of smiley plots but are as of yet unclassified
- i.e., no one has a good explanation as to what is causing it.

If you happen to know, please report your explanation at
[https://github.com/SPAAM-community/little-book-of-smiley-plots](https://github.com/SPAAM-community/little-book-of-smiley-plots).
